meanings.definition: A small arachnid that includes mites and ticks.
meanings.sent1: The acarids crawled slowly across the leaf.
meanings.sent2: I found acarids in the dusty corners of my room.
meanings.sent3: The acarids decided to have a tiny dance party on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: The acarids multiplied rapidly, like a hidden army emerging.
meanings.sent5: The acarids, with their eight legs, looked like miniature monsters under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A member of the Acaridae family of mites.
meanings.sent1: We studied the behavior of acarids in the Acaridae family.
meanings.sent2: The acarids in our garden belong to the Acaridae group.
meanings.sent3: The Acaridae family reunion was attended by all the acarids.
meanings.sent4: The Acaridae acarids stuck together like a close-knit community.
meanings.sent5: The Acaridae acarids scurried around in search of food, resembling a bustling town.
